briefTitle: A Phase 3 Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of OCS-01 Eyedrops Compared to Vehicle for the Treatment of Ocular Inflammation and Pain Following Cataract Surgery
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-masked, Vehicle-controlled Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of OCS-01 Eyedrops Compared to Vehicle in the Treatment of Inflammation and Pain Following Cataract Surgery
summary: This was a randomized, double-masked, vehicle-controlled, Phase 3 study evaluating the efficacy and safety of OCS-01 QD compared to vehicle in the treatment of inflammation and pain following cataract surgery.

primaryOutcome.measure: Absence of Anterior Chamber Cells at Visit 6.
